thread.section_title: Solar Quotes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solar Quotes | solarquotes.com.au
thread.title: Graham Rynders
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Graham Rynders

author: Graham Rynders
title: Graham Rynders
text: Like most people looking to get solar installed I was amazed to find so many different opinions and suppliers available. Its all a bit confusing but having been contacted and obtaining three Quote: s by three different companies my decision was made a little bit less difficult. I still did a lot of research on the internet though before I made my decision. Trying to sort the wheat from the chaff is important and the cheapest Quote: is not always what you want. Neither was the most expensive and there was quite a deal of variation in price too. But the overall process certainly helped me make my choice.
